summary: Makes Deathbrand unique instead of regular old Stalhrim armor. Also better resolution.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#1e84cc][size=6]Deathbrand Remodeled[/size][/color]
[/b][/center]
[center][color=#ff0000][size=4]NOTICE:[/size][/color] This armor was originally made by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33368/?][b]lautasantenni[/b][/url], but based off of Mashintao's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48894/?]Stalhrim Redone[/url] all I have done is used it to replace the deathbrand armor and thought I could share it with this fantastic community.[/center]

[left][color=#1e84cc][size=4] Description:[/size][/color] A simple re-placer for Deathbrand ... (obviously) ... so that it stands out from the normal Stalhrim armor.

[color=#1e84cc][size=4] Installation:[/size][/color]
Here's the link to his mod -> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48894/?]Stalhrim Redone
[/url] Alternatively, you can use the meshes from here as well -> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33368/?]Stalhrim Extra Crafting

[/url][size=5] [color=#1e84cc]DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS:[/color]
[color=#1e84cc][/color]1. Download this mod manually -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48894/?
2. Unpack/unzip the mod you just downloaded using WinRAR or another form of archiving program and find the "meshes" folder and place that on your desktop.[/size][/left][left][size=5] 3. Download my mod manually and unzip that to your desktop. 
4. Now you should have a meshes folder and my mod (as a folder) on your desktop.
5. Open my mod and drag and drop the "meshes" folder into my mod.
6. Once finished, Repack/ Rezip my mod so it is now a .rar or .zip file, name it however you like, and install it using a mod manager.

[youtube]DKPu4FVz8sk[/youtube]
[/size]

[size=4][color=#1e84cc] Another[/color] [color=#ff0000]NOTICE:[/color][/size] There might be a problem where the players' nose clips through the helmet, can't find a way to fix it unfortunately. 

[color=#1e84cc][size=4] Credits:[/size][/color] Lautasantenni - For the armor he created
Mashintao - For the textures he created


[/left]
[color=#1e84cc][size=5][u][b] My mods: [/b][/u][/size]
[/color][center][color=#1e84cc][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/20335/?]Improved Megaton Home[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63207/?]HearthFires - Unique Display Room[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55951/?]Lake House[/url][/size][/color][/center]

author: Jayer117
